cards.title: 简介
cards.body: Kotlin 备忘清单是 [Kotlin](https://kotlinlang.org) 编程语言的单页参考表

cards.title: main() 函数
main() 函数
cards.body: main() 函数是每个 Kotlin 程序的起点，在执行之前必须包含在代码中

cards.title: 打印声明
cards.code:
println("Greetings, earthling!")
print("Take me to ")
print("your leader.")

/* 
打印:
Greetings, earthling!
Take me to your leader.
*/

cards.title: 注释
cards.code:
// 这是单行注释

/*
这个
注释
用于
多
行
*/

cards.title: 执行顺序
可变变量
cards.code:
var age = 25
age = 26

cards.title: 不可变变量
cards.code: val goldenRatio = 1.618

cards.title: 类型推断
字符串连接
cards.code:
var streetAddress = "123 Main St."
var cityState = "Brooklyn, NY" 

println(streetAddress + " " + cityState) 
// 打印: 123 Main St. Brooklyn, NY

cards.title: 字符串模板
内置属性和函数
字符转义序列
cards.code:
print("\"Excellent!\" I cried. \"Elementary,\" said he.") 

// 打印: "Excellent!" I cried. "Elementary," said he.

cards.title: 字符转义序列
cards.body:
• `\n` 插入新行
• `\t` 插入标签
• `\r` 插入回车
• `\'` 插入单引号
• `\"` 插入双引号
• `\\` 插入反斜杠
• `\$` 插入美元符号

cards.title: 增强赋值运算符
递增和递减运算符
cards.code:
var year = 2019 
year++ // 2020
year-- // 2019

cards.title: if 表达式
else 表达式
Else-If 表达式
比较运算符
cards.code:
var myAge = 19
var sisterAge = 11
var cousinAge = 11

myAge > sisterAge  // true
myAge < cousinAge  // false
myAge >= cousinAge // true
myAge <= sisterAge // false

cards.title: 逻辑运算符
AND 运算符： &&
或运算符：||
NOT 运算符
cards.code:
var hungry = true
var full = false

println(!hungry) //  false
println(!full) //  true

cards.title: 评估顺序
cards.code:
!true && (false || true) // false
/*
(false || true) 被评估首先返回 true。
然后，评估 !true && true 并返回最终结果 false
*/

!false && true || false // true
/*
!false 被评估首先返回 true。 
然后评估 true && true，返回 true。
那么，真|| 评估 false 最终返回 true
*/

cards.title: 等式运算符
cards.code:
var myAge = 22
var sisterAge = 21

myAge == sisterAge // false
myAge !== sisterAge // true

cards.title: 嵌套条件
当表达式
范围运算符
不可变列表
cards.code: var programmingLanguages = listOf("C#", "Java", "Kotlin", "Ruby")

cards.title: 可变列表
cards.code: var fruits = mutableListOf("Orange", "Apple", "Banana", "Mango")

cards.title: 访问列表元素
cards.code:
var cars = listOf("BMW", "Ferrari", "Volvo", "Tesla")

println(cars[2]) // Prints: Volvo

cards.title: 大小属性
cards.code:
var worldContinents = listOf("Asia", "Africa", "North America", "South America", "Antarctica", "Europe", "Australia")

println(worldContinents.size) // Prints: 7

cards.title: 列表操作
不可变集
cards.code: var primaryColors = setOf("Red", "Blue", "Yellow")

cards.title: 可变集
cards.code: var womenInTech = mutableSetOf("Ada Lovelace",  "Grace Hopper",  "Radia Perlman",  "Sister Mary Kenneth Keller")

cards.title: 访问集合元素
不可变映射
cards.code: var averageTemp = mapOf("winter" to 35,  "spring" to 60,  "summer" to 85, "fall" to 55)

cards.title: 可变映射
cards.code: var europeanDomains = mutableMapOf("Germany" to "de", "Slovakia" to "sk", "Hungary" to "hu", "Norway" to "no")
